CreateAuthorizationPolicy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mqtt.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAuthorizationPolicy
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "mqtt-jeredv33",
    "PolicyName": "name",
    "PolicyVersion": 1,
    "Priority": 2,
    "Effect": "allow",
    "Actions": "connect",
    "Retain": 1,
    "Qos": "1"
}
